Name: Image Transitions
Description: Images can fade in and out

Name: Cut button
Description: Video clips and image clips can be split into separate pieces with a cut button

Name: Image overlays and reposition
Description: Allow users to place images over the top of other images and adjust the size and location

Name: Pause button
Description: add a separate pause button from the play button

Name: Zoom-in
Description: add a slider that allows users to zoom in and out
